oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alexander Hay (A. H.) Ritchie engraving of President Andrew Johnson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Steel engraving of President Andrew Johnson found within a bound volume containing the Presidential Pardon for Lieutenant General Nathan Bedford Forrest, CSA.

Many of Alexander Hay Ritchie's works were produced by authorization of the Librarian of Congress, Washington, D.C. It is assumed that this portrait engraving of President Andrew Johnson was one of those works.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ritchie, Alexander Hay (1822-1895)
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Historical Society Civil War Collection, 1860-1982
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Johnson, Andrew, 1808-1875; Ritchie, Alexander Hay, 1822-1895
Presidents; Steel engravings
